meta.title: Image Blocks
meta.description: Look at a series of images and answer questions about them
meta.disclaimer: Your participation in this research is voluntary. You may decline further participation, at any time, without adverse consequences. Your anonymity is assured; the researchers who have requested your participation will not receive any personal information about you.

steps: You will be shown several paired blocks of images.
During each block the images will change automatically after a fixed time.
After each pair of blocks you will be asked several questions you will have to answer.
